import { memo } from 'react'; import { DataTable } from 'primereact/datatable'; import { Column } from 'primereact/column'; function Modal(props) { const { detailOrder, note, onChangeNote, handeModalUpdateStatus, handeModalCancel } = props; return (

{ detailOrder.length > 0 && detailOrder[0].Status !== '2' ?
